pattern_artifact.description: Brief, action-oriented, fast decision-making communication style

communication.brevity: Prefers bullet points over long emails
communication.format: Three bullet points, not a dissertation

examples: Go with Stripe. Don't overthink it.

expectations.response_time: 24 hours for email, 2 hours for urgent
expectations.escalation: Flag blockers she can help with

budget_sensitivity.example: Can you deliver loyalty program AND hit June 30? If yes: approved. If no: phase 2.

observations: Sends late emails but says 'ignore until morning'
Remembers who did what, credits individuals
Always CC Jennifer on major discussions

outputs.summary: Sarah (Acme CEO) prefers brief, action-oriented communication. She makes decisions fast and trusts the team's expertise. Key preferences: (1) Three bullet points, not dissertations, (2) Weekly status updates at executive level, (3) Flag blockers she can help with, (4) Speed > perfection. Always CC Jennifer on major discussions.
